title: Ideal Land for an Investment
details:
Ideal for Future investment or to build a holiday home with perfect nature landscape...(Only 35 km from the Colombo main city limits) This Valuble land situated just 5 km from Galanigama highway exit & Only 6Km to Horana town. Also 800m to Panadura Anguruwatota main road..... 130 feet road side face with 20 feet wide access road. If needed, this land can be sold as two parts (102.5 perches per part)..
Clear deeds accepted by banks. Overseas buyers also welcome ..... just Rs.115000/= per perch. please call for more information.
